/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A tall street lamp stands on the right side of the image, its presence adding a sense of symmetry to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, mountains can be seen, their majestic peaks adding a sense of depth and scale to the image. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions by objects. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the trees, bushes, and street lamp all aligned along the street. The mountains in the background provide a beautiful contrast to the urban elements in the foreground. Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban development and natural beauty.
